title: Add New Recurring Bill Inline
description: Verify that a user can add a new recurring bill using the inline form without any page reload, and that the new bill appends to the bottom of the list with correct data.

steps.description: Navigate to the Recurring Bills block in a workspace.
Click the 'Add New' inline form to create a new recurring bill.
Fill in the name, amount, category, and select the due day using the calendar picker.
Submit the new recurring bill inline (e.g., press Enter or click save).
Verify no page reload occurs.
Verify the new recurring bill appears appended at the bottom of the recurring bills list.
Verify the new recurring bill data matches the input values.
Verify backend synchronization occurs asynchronously and updates local state optimistically.

title: Inline Edit Existing Recurring Bill Fields
description: Verify users can edit existing recurring bill fields (name, amount, category, due day) inline, save changes on blur or Enter key, and cancel edits on Escape key without page reloads.

steps.description: Navigate to an existing recurring bill item in the Recurring Bills block.
Click on the name field to enter inline edit mode.
Modify the name field and press Enter.
Verify the name field updates with the new value and inline edit mode exits.
Edit the amount field inline and blur the input.
Verify the amount field updates and saves changes.
Open the calendar picker for due day inline edit.
Select a new due day.
Verify due day updates correctly with no page reload.
Edit category inline, then press Escape key.
Verify the category field reverts to original value and exits edit mode without saving.
Verify that no page reload or full data reload was triggered during editing.
Verify backend receives update requests asynchronously and local state displays optimistic UI.

title: Delete Recurring Bill Inline
description: Verify users can delete a recurring bill inline with immediate UI update, no full page reload, and data synchronization with backend.

steps.description: Navigate to the Recurring Bills block.
Select a recurring bill item and click the delete button.
Verify an immediate removal of the recurring bill item in the UI without page reload.
Verify backend synchronization occurs asynchronously.

title: Calendar Picker Mobile Responsiveness and Touch Support
description: Verify the calendar picker for due day selection is fully functional, visible, and touch-optimized on mobile devices for selecting dates.

steps.description: Open the application on a mobile emulator or real device at mobile screen widths.
Navigate to Recurring Bills and initiate the due day calendar picker inline edit.
Verify the calendar picker renders properly within the viewport without truncation.
Select a due day via touch interaction.
Verify the selected due day updates the recurring bill field correctly.
Verify there are no event propagation issues that cause unwanted page reloads.

title: Offline Support Data Caching and Synchronization
description: Verify that when offline, the application caches recurring bills data, allows edits and additions offline, and synchronizes all changes upon reconnection.

steps.description: Simulate offline mode (e.g., disable network connection).
Navigate to Recurring Bills block; verify cached data is displayed.
Add a new recurring bill using inline form.
Edit an existing recurring bill inline.
Delete a recurring bill inline.
Simulate network reconnection.
Verify all offline changes synchronize correctly with backend without data loss.
Verify UI updates reflect latest backend data after sync.

title: Optimistic UI and State Management Verification
description: Verify that inline edits, additions, and deletions reflect immediately in local state with optimistic UI updates, and no unnecessary API calls or full data reloads are triggered.

steps.description: Perform inline edit on a recurring bill field.
Verify the updated value reflects immediately in local state.
Monitor network requests; verify only relevant update API call is made, no full data reload.
Add a new recurring bill inline.
Verify new bill is immediately appended at bottom locally.
Verify backend sync occurs asynchronously without blocking UI.
Delete a recurring bill inline.
Verify deleted bill removed immediately locally without full reload.

title: Keyboard Shortcuts and Escape Key Cancellation
description: Verify that pressing Enter saves inline edits, pressing Escape cancels edits reverting to original values, and keyboard shortcuts function correctly in the Recurring Bills block.

steps.description: Click on a recurring bill field to enter inline edit mode.
Modify the field value and press Escape.
Verify the field reverts to the original value and exits edit mode.
Click on a recurring bill field again, edit the value, and press Enter.
Verify the changes are saved and edit mode exits.
Test keyboard shortcuts used by the Command menu (CMDK) within the Recurring Bills UI.
Verify expected command menu shortcuts trigger appropriate commands and maintain accessibility.

title: Responsive UI Verification Across Breakpoints
description: Verify the Recurring Bills block and its components correctly render and function on small (sm), medium (md), and large (lg) screen sizes, including mobile devices.

steps.description: Resize browser to small screen breakpoint (typical mobile size).
Verify Recurring Bills block is fully visible and usable, including calendar picker functionality.
Resize to medium screen breakpoint (tablet size).
Verify layout adjusts properly without UI clipping and inline editing is seamless.
Resize to large screen breakpoint (desktop size).
Verify full UI features including drag and drop sortable blocks are functional.

title: Internationalization Rendering and Input Support
description: Verify that the Recurring Bills block supports multiple languages (pt-BR, en, es) properly, including translations in UI, inline forms, calendar pickers, and notifications.

steps.description: Switch application language to pt-BR.
Verify all UI text including labels, calendar picker, buttons, and notifications are shown in Brazilian Portuguese.
Switch language to Spanish (es).
Verify UI elements are correctly translated in Spanish.
Switch language to English (en).
Verify UI is fully in English with correct date formatting.

title: Financial Data Visualization Real-Time Update
description: Verify that financial charts and category summaries related to recurring bills update in real-time as bill data changes (add, edit, delete) and reflect backend data modifications.

steps.description: Open a financial chart or category summary view related to recurring bills.
Add a new recurring bill inline.
Verify the chart or summary updates immediately to reflect the added bill.
Edit an existing recurring bill's amount.
Verify charts and summaries update with the new amount in real-time.
Delete a recurring bill.
Verify the visualizations reflect the removal immediately.

title: Drag and Drop Sortable Blocks Interaction
description: Verify users can customize the finance dashboard by dragging and dropping sortable blocks including Recurring Bills, ensuring proper rearrangement and state persistence.

steps.description: Navigate to the finance dashboard containing sortable blocks.
Click and drag the Recurring Bills block to a different position.
Verify the block reorders visually without glitches.
Release the dragged block and verify position persists on page refresh.

title: Event Propagation and Page Reload Prevention
description: Verify that interactions within the Recurring Bills block, such as inline edits, calendar picker usage, and add/delete operations do not trigger unwanted event propagation causing page reloads.

steps.description: Perform inline edit on any field.
Verify no page reload is triggered.
Open and select a date from calendar picker.
Verify no page reload or navigation occurs.
Add a new recurring bill.
Verify the page does not reload or refresh.
Delete an existing recurring bill.
Verify the deletion does not cause a page reload.
